welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fernandina Beach, where the charm of Southern hospitality meets the beauty of the Atlantic coast. Enjoy our quaint downtown, known for its vibrant art scene and stunning beaches. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories in our charming city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights and includes a lounge area and private check-in services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jacksonville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Jacksonville Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Jacksonville Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
